S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-3306 (+DERBY-3412): jdbc4.StatementEventsTest cannot be run individually in a clean environment. This commit backs out the previous patch committed for this issue (revision 620480). Manual work was required because J2EEDataSourceTest has been split off DataSourceTest in the mean time. This patch also fixes StatementEventsTest by setting the createDatabase to create. Patch file: derby-3306-2a-backout_and_alternative_fix.diff
